casebody.data:
Augustus J. Simmons v. J. William Burns, Commissioner of Transportation (5028)

Hull, Daly and Bieluch, Js.

Argued October 10 released October 16, 1986 *803Eugene C. Cushman, with whom was Augustus J. Simmons, pro se, for the appellant (plaintiff). Arnold K. Shimelman, assistant attorney general, with whom, on the brief, was Joseph I. Lieberman, attorney general, for the appellee (defendant). Per Curiam.

There is no error.
